title: Puck Me Harder
description: Kai Mita is hockey’s resident bad boy.He’s also the key to my career.An assignment covering the Houston Snowhawks is a rookie sports journalists’ literal dream come true. There’s only one problem— My new position depends on me getting the scoop on Hawks’ defenseman Kai Mita.Kai leads the team in suspensions, drama, and looking good shirtless.He also doesn’t talk to the press. Ever. Then a golden opportunity comes along, and I’m not about to pass it.My career is on thin ice. My heart is in the penalty box.And I’m about to shoot my shot.Get ready for a steamy sports series hot enough to melt the ice! Puck Me Harder is a fast-paced hockey romance featuring a bad boy and the journalist determined to get the story and the man.
author: Regina Wade
